description: The demolition of the existing buildings on the site of 2-36 Plassy Road SE6 and construction of a part three/part four storey block (fronting Plassy Road), incorporating balconies, comprising 21 one bedroom, 24 two bedroom and 4 three bedroom self-contained flats and a two storey terrace of 11 three bedroom houses, together with associated landscaping and provision of an electricity sub-station, plant room, refuse/recycling store and cycle store.
